name: .GIS File Extension
summary: Learn about .GIS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A GIS file is a settings file used by Zaplots CFS Console, a console application used to install and run Zaplots programs. It contains a reference to and installation settings for an associated .CFS file. CFS Console uses the settings a GIS file contains while installing the associated CFS file.

content: Zaplots is a software developer best known for developing video games and backup software. Users install and run Zaplots software using CFS Console, the company's proprietary console app, which is available for Windows.

instructions: You can open a GIS file and view the installation settings it contains using Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor. You can use Zaplots CFS Console (Windows) to install the program (.CFS file) a GIS file references.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
